meanings.definition: The water in which dishes are washed.
meanings.sent1: After dinner, the sink was filled with soapy dishwaters.
meanings.sent2: She carefully poured the dishwaters into the drain after washing the plates.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat jumped into the dishwaters and splashed around, making a mess.
meanings.sent4: The dishwaters swirled down the drain like a mini whirlpool.
meanings.sent5: The warm dishwaters felt soothing on her hands as she scrubbed the dishes clean.

meanings.definition: The dirty water left after washing dishes.
meanings.sent1: Mom asked me to empty the dishwaters from the sink before they got too dirty.
meanings.sent2: The dishwaters had bits of food floating in them, so I had to change the water.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to drink from the dishwaters, thinking it was a new water bowl.
meanings.sent4: The dishwaters looked like a murky swamp after a big family dinner.
meanings.sent5: The foul smell of the dishwaters made me hurry to finish washing the dishes.
